channel.title: K-Means on Hugo Grimoire
channel.description: Recent content in K-Means on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: k-means Clustering
item.description: _k-means clustering_ is a method of vector quantization, originally from signal processing, that aims to partition n observations into k clusters in which each observation belongs to the cluster with the nearest mean (cluster centers or cluster centroid), serving as a prototype of the cluster. This results in a partitioning of the data space into Voronoi cells.
